name: No Eyestraining Coloured Text
description: Overrides the custom text colouring in text posts to simply revert to black.
additional_info:
JULY 2020 UPDATED for new dashboard coding

---

Default is set to apply to the entirety of tumblr's dashboard. However, if you would rather only have it effect saved tags and searches, change the URL settings to URLs starting with https://www.tumblr.com/tagged/ and/or https://www.tumblr.com/search/
